Title: Prefrontal connections of medial motor areas in the rhesus monkey

@BrainMaps_Delineation.RelatedMaps: Refers to W40, HMS88, VPR87, V93, PG91

@Injections.Citation: "The injection site in case 1 was focused in the dorsal bank of the caudal PS, with some involvement of the ventral bank in the superficial layers. There was no spread of tracer to the deep layers or to the fundus of the PS (Fig. 3A,B)."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Labeling in rostromedial area 6 (6m) in section B may involve the F6 or pre-SMA forelimb region…"
"Labeling in rostromedial area 6 (6m) in section B may involve the F6 or pre-SMA forelimb region…"
"Projections to the presumed 'F6' or 'pre-SMA' region were sparse, but focused near the dorsal rim of the cingulate sulcus near the 6m/24 border."
"Sparse anterograde and/or retrograde labeling was observed in rostral area 24a, with more dense labeling in posterior 24a, and throughout area 23a."
"Sparse anterograde and/or retrograde labeling was observed in rostral area 24a, with more dense labeling in posterior 24a, and throughout area 23a."
"Areas 24b and 23b both were labeled in case 1..."
"Areas 24b and 23b both were labeled in case 1..."

"The larger injection site projected to the forelimb portion of CMAr in a columnar fashion at its maximum, and sparsely in other sections (Figs. 3B,C,6). A projection was also detected between the PS and the forelimb representation of CMAc in this case (Fig.7A,B)."

"The larger injection site projected to the forelimb portion of CMAr in a columnar fashion at its maximum, and sparsely in other sections (Figs. 3B,C,6). A projection was also detected between the PS and the forelimb representation of CMAc in this case (Fig.7A,B)."
"Both anterograde and retrograde labeling was observed medially along the superior frontal gyrus in area 6...In both cases, the labeling was restricted to the rostral limit of the SMA (Fig. 5A,B)."

@Injections.Citation: "This injection site was confined to Walker's area 12, rostral to the lower limb of the inferior arcuate sulcus, and confined to the lateral surface (Fig. 4C)."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Only a small portion of the cingulate cortex was labeled in this case. Labeling of the cingulate gyrus and both banks of the cingulate sulcus was restricted to the vicinity of the genu of the corpus callosum. No labeling was seen in the cingulate motor areas."
@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Comments: According to the nomenclature of VPR87 that was used in this article, the lower bank of the rostral half of the cingulate sulcus corresponds to area 24c, and the anterior cingulate gyrus consists of areas 24a and 24b (see VPR87, p. 261).

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Only a small portion of the cingulate cortex was labeled in this case. Labeling of the cingulate gyrus and both banks of the cingulate sulcus was restricted to the vicinity of the genu of the corpus callosum. No labeling was seen in the cingulate motor areas."
@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Comments: According to the nomenclature of VPR87 that was used in this article, the lower bank of the rostral half of the cingulate sulcus corresponds to area 24c, and the anterior cingulate gyrus consists of areas 24a and 24b (see VPR87, p. 261).

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "A few cells were labeled in the rostral portion of the SMA consistent with previous cases."
"A few cells were labeled in the rostral portion of the SMA consistent with previous cases."
"Injections in areas…45…did not label either the CMAs or the SMA…Case 11 (area 45) had remarkably few connections and the medial surface was not labeled at all."
"Injections in areas…45…did not label either the CMAs or the SMA…Case 11 (area 45) had remarkably few connections and the medial surface was not labeled at all."

@Injections.Citation: "The rostral third of the SMA, including the mediodorsal edge was involved in the rostral injection site. More caudally, the second injection site was confined to the medial surface, without encroaching on the cingulate sulcus (Fig. 11)."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "The cingulate gyrus was sparsely labeled. However, areas 24c and 23c (including the CMAs) were extensively labeled (Fig. 11C,D). In CMAr, labeled cells and terminals were found in both forelimb and hindlimb regions. In contrast, labeling in the CMAc was found predominantly in the hindlimb region. The sulcal labeling in this case was far more extensive than in any of the prefrontal cases. Some anterograde and retrograde labeling was also found anterior to the rostral CMA."

"The cingulate gyrus was sparsely labeled. However, areas 24c and 23c (including the CMAs) were extensively labeled (Fig. 11C,D). In CMAr, labeled cells and terminals were found in both forelimb and hindlimb regions. In contrast, labeling in the CMAc was found predominantly in the hindlimb region. The sulcal labeling in this case was far more extensive than in any of the prefrontal cases. Some anterograde and retrograde labeling was also found anterior to the rostral CMA."

"…labeled cells were found in areas 46, 8a, 9 and 12. However, no connections with area 11 were observed in this case. Other than labeling of caudal prefrontal areas 8b and 9, no other connections were seen with medial prefrontal cortex."

"…labeled cells were found in areas 46, 8a, 9 and 12. However, no connections with area 11 were observed in this case. Other than labeling of caudal prefrontal areas 8b and 9, no other connections were seen with medial prefrontal cortex."

@Injections.Citation: "This case involved four separate injections. The most anterior focus encroached on portions of the caudal SMA, far from the area connected with prefrontal areas (Fig. 12). The halo from this focus merged indistinguishably with the halo of a nearby injection site in the dorsal bank of the cingulate sulcus. Two additional foci were situated in the ventral bank and portions of the ventral rim of the cingulate sulcus, at the approximate boundary between cingulate areas 24 and 23, and can be considered nonselective cingulate motor area injections."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Cingulate cortex was labeled throughout, in both banks of the cingulate sulcus, including the fundus, as well as the gyrus. Cingulate motor areas were therefore heavily labeled (Fig. 12A-D)."
"Cingulate cortex was labeled throughout, in both banks of the cingulate sulcus, including the fundus, as well as the gyrus. Cingulate motor areas were therefore heavily labeled (Fig. 12A-D)."

"The entire SMA region was extensively labeled, including the rostral edge. In contrast to all previous cases, widespread retrograde and anterograde label was seen in primary motor cortex, or medial area 4 (Fig. 12D)."

"The entire SMA region was extensively labeled, including the rostral edge. In contrast to all previous cases, widespread retrograde and anterograde label was seen in primary motor cortex, or medial area 4 (Fig. 12D)."

"Labeling observed in areas 8b, 9 and dorsal 46 was similar to that observed following injection of the SMA, and may therefore be attributable to the inclusion of SMA in the injection sites. However, unlike case 12, this case involved extensive labeling of the ventral PS, and more widespread projections to area 12.  Orbital areas 11 and 13 were also labeled. Medially, labeled cells or terminals were found throughout the full extent of areas 8b and 9, and a portion of area 25 was labeled as well. "

"Labeling observed in areas 8b, 9 and dorsal 46 was similar to that observed following injection of the SMA, and may therefore be attributable to the inclusion of SMA in the injection sites. However, unlike case 12, this case involved extensive labeling of the ventral PS, and more widespread projections to area 12.  Orbital areas 11 and 13 were also labeled. Medially, labeled cells or terminals were found throughout the full extent of areas 8b and 9, and a portion of area 25 was labeled as well. "

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.AddedDescription: Fig. 12 shows retrograde labeling in area 6D.
Fig. 12 shows anterograde labeling in area 6D.

@Injections.Citation: "This site occupied the lip or convexity of the dorsal bank of the PS on the lateral surface of the hemisphere. The region injected in case 2 may have been involved in the larger injection site of case 1."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Sparse anterograde and/or retrograde labeling was observed in rostral area 24a, with more dense labeling in posterior 24a...Areas 24b and 23b both were labeled in case 1, whereas only area 23b was labeled in case 2."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.AddedDescription: Fig. 5A shows only anterograde, but no retrograde labeling in CMAr.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "The results of case 2 were similar to those in case 1 except that the labeling observed in CMAr was weaker and lacked a columnar pattern; on the other hand, columnar labeling and dense retrograde labeling was seen in the hindlimb portion of CMAc (Figs. 3E, 7C)."

@Injections.Citation: "The injection site in case 3 involved the caudal portion of the ventral bank of the PS, without spread of injectate to the rims or fundus of the sulcus. However, there was some involvement of the dorsal bank at the rostral border of the injection site, as well as of white matter subjacent to the ventral bank thoughout much of the extent of the injection site. In contrast to all other cases presented here, thisn injection was placed in the right hemisphere..."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "The anterior third of the cingulate gyrus (areas 24a and 24b) was labeled thoughout its extent in case 3. Columnar labeling was apparent in many sections."
"The anterior third of the cingulate gyrus (areas 24a and 24b) was labeled thoughout its extent in case 3. Columnar labeling was apparent in many sections."
"Cingulate motor areas were not targeted in either case, though some labeling was seen in case 3 in both banks of the rostral portion of the cingulate sulcus anterior to the CMAs."
@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Comments: According to the nomenclature of VPR87 that was used in this article, the lower bank of the rostral half of the cingulate sulcus corresponds to area 24c (see VPR87, p. 261).

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Cingulate motor areas were not targeted in either case, though some labeling was seen in case 3 in both banks of the rostral portion of the cingulate sulcus anterior to the CMAs."
@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Comments: According to the nomenclature of VPR87 that was used in this article, the lower bank of the rostral half of the cingulate sulcus corresponds to area 24c (see VPR87, p. 261).

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Columnar labeling was restricted to the most rostral region of the SMA in case 3, as well as in medial granular cortex rostral to the SMA. No labeling was detected in the superior frontal gyrus caudal to this rostral edge of the SMA."

"Columnar labeling was restricted to the most rostral region of the SMA in case 3, as well as in medial granular cortex rostral to the SMA. No labeling was detected in the superior frontal gyrus caudal to this rostral edge of the SMA."

@Injections.Citation: "In case 4, a small injection...was made in the ventral rim of the PS, approximately at the midpoint of the sulcus."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Following the more limited injection of case 4, the cingulate gyrus contained only a few labeled cells or terminals. Cingulate motor areas were not targeted in either case..."
"Following the more limited injection of case 4, the cingulate gyrus contained only a few labeled cells or terminals. Cingulate motor areas were not targeted in either case..."

@Injections.Citation: "This injection site was situated in the elbow of the arcuate sulcus, caudal to the PS, in Walker's area 8A (Fig. 9). The lower bank of the superior limb of the arcuate sulcus, and the upper bank of the inferior limb were included in the injection site at its maximum extent."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Light anterograde and retrograde labeling extended throughout much of the cingulate gyrus, particularly caudal areas 24a and b and areas 23a and 23b (Fig. 9A-D)."
"Light anterograde and retrograde labeling extended throughout much of the cingulate gyrus, particularly caudal areas 24a and b and areas 23a and 23b (Fig. 9A-D)."

"Sparse anterograde label was detectable in caudal area 24c, apparently involving the hindlimb portion of CMAr (Fig. 9C). On the other hand, the region of labeling in area 23c seemed to correspond to the forelimb representation of CMAc…Some labeling was also observed in the dorsal bank of the cingulate sulcus, rostral to the genu of the corpus callosum, but nowhere else in the cingulate sulcus (Fig. 9A)."

"Sparse anterograde label was detectable in caudal area 24c, apparently involving the hindlimb portion of CMAr (Fig. 9C). On the other hand, the region of labeling in area 23c seemed to correspond to the forelimb representation of CMAc…Some labeling was also observed in the dorsal bank of the cingulate sulcus, rostral to the genu of the corpus callosum, but nowhere else in the cingulate sulcus (Fig. 9A)."
"Only a few cells were labeled in the rostral portion of the SMA…However, this medial labeling extended to the dorsal surface of the convexity, which was heavily labeled (Figs. 8, 9A)."
"Only a few cells were labeled in the rostral portion of the SMA…However, this medial labeling extended to the dorsal surface of the convexity, which was heavily labeled (Figs. 8, 9A)."

@Injections.Citation: "The area 9 injection in case 6 was situated rostrally in medial area 9. The maximum extent of this site on the medial surface encompassed the entire superior frontal gyrus at the anterior-posterior level of the anterior tip of the cingulate sulcus, and the convexity of the frontal gyrus to the dorsal surface."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Labeling was particularly dense in areas 24a, 24b, and 24c in the anterior third of the cingulate sulcus, rostral to the CMAr, which was not labeled."
"Labeling was particularly dense in areas 24a, 24b, and 24c in the anterior third of the cingulate sulcus, rostral to the CMAr, which was not labeled."
"…area 23 in the posterior cingulate gyrus was also labeled. Area 23b was the most heavily labeled subdivision of area 23, while 23c contained no label."
"…area 23 in the posterior cingulate gyrus was also labeled. Area 23b was the most heavily labeled subdivision of area 23, while 23c contained no label."
"The SMA proper was devoid of both retrograde and anterograde label, but, as in other cases, labeling was observed only at the rostral edge of the SMA region on the medial surface…"
"The SMA proper was devoid of both retrograde and anterograde label, but, as in other cases, labeling was observed only at the rostral edge of the SMA region on the medial surface…"
"Injections in area 10…did not label either the CMAs or the SMA."
"Injections in area 10…did not label either the CMAs or the SMA."

@Injections.Citation: "This injection site...involved the medial and lateral banks of the lateral orbital sulcus, as well as the cortex lateral to this sulcus (orbital area 12), which spread to the edge of the convexity at its maximum extent. There was no spread of tracer to the lateral surface."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "The rostral CMA was devoid of labeling, but labeled cells and terminals were seen caudally in the ventral bank of the cingulate sulcus, presumably in the hindlimb region of the CMAc (Fig. 5, 10E)."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.AddedDescription: Fig. 10A shows retrograde labeling in area 6D.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "A few sections had labeling at the rostral border of the SMA (Fig. 10A), but no other labeling was observed in the SMA (Fig. 10B-D). Unlike other cases with labeling in this SMA region, this projection preferentially targeted the ventromedial portion of the SMA, closest to the cingulate sulcus."

"A few sections had labeling at the rostral border of the SMA (Fig. 10A), but no other labeling was observed in the SMA (Fig. 10B-D). Unlike other cases with labeling in this SMA region, this projection preferentially targeted the ventromedial portion of the SMA, closest to the cingulate sulcus."
"Projections to the presumed 'F6' or 'pre-SMA' region were sparse, but focused near the dorsal rim of the cingulate sulcus near the 6m/24 border."

"Only a very few labeled terminals were seen in the anterior cingulate gyrus. Some clusters of labeling were observed rostrally in the ventral bank of the cingulate sulcus, anterior to the CMAr. However, areas 23a and 23b were labeled throughout the anterior portion of the caudal gyrus (Fig. 10C-E)."
@LabelledSites_Descriptions.AddedDescription: Figures show retrograde and anterograde labeling in areas 24a-c.

publication.title: Prefrontal connections of medial motor areas in the rhesus monkey
